autocompleter

Class Autocompleter

  • java.lang.Object
    • autocompleter.Autocompleter

  • public class Autocompleter
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Autocompleter()
      This method inicializates the data structures TST and PhoneticTST and calls the method readFile

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String autocomplete(java.lang.String word)
      This method returns a list of words that starts with the given string
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void modifySearch(java.lang.String word)
      This method looks for a word in the TST
      void readFile(java.lang.String dir)
      This method reads a .txt file and inserts the words in the calls the methods addWord from the classes TST and PhoneticTST
      java.lang.String search(java.lang.String word)
      This method receives a String called word and returns a String with a list of words sorted alphabetically with word as a phonetical filter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Autocompleter

        public Autocompleter()
        This method inicializates the data structures TST and PhoneticTST and calls the method readFile

    • Method Detail

      • readFile

        public void readFile(java.lang.String dir)
        This method reads a .txt file and inserts the words in the calls the methods addWord from the classes TST and PhoneticTST
        Parameters:
        dir - The direction of the file including its name and extension

      • autocomplete

        public java.lang.String autocomplete(java.lang.String word)
        This method returns a list of words that starts with the given string
        Parameters:
        word - The word that will be used to get the list of words
        Returns:
        A list of words as a String

      • search

        public java.lang.String search(java.lang.String word)
        This method receives a String called word and returns a String with a list of words sorted alphabetically with word as a phonetical filter.
        Parameters:
        word - The word that we want to use as a phonetical filter.
        Returns:
        a list of words as a String

      • modifySearch

        public void modifySearch(java.lang.String word)
        This method looks for a word in the TST
        Parameters:
        word - the wanted word

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments
